title: Train Sim World® 3: West Cornwall - Steam Railtour
description: Take on a new steam-hauled challenge in Train Sim World 3, tackle the Cornish countryside with regulator at full blast, race through forestry and power to the end of the line at Penzance in Rivet Games’ West Cornwall Steam Railtour Add-On!
longDescription:
Take on a new steam-hauled challenge in Train Sim World 3, tackle the Cornish countryside with regulator at full blast, race through forestry and power to the end of the line at Penzance in Rivet Games’ West Cornwall Steam Railtour Add-On!

Ever since the days of the steam era ended, enthusiasts have kept the fire alive through the hard efforts of preservation. The LMS Jubilee Class is no exception, with a quartet of kettles still surviving to this day in various conditions.

One such condition is “mainline certified”, granting the workhorses of yesteryear the chance to freely roam once again on the UK national rail network. To facilitate this, mainline certified steam locomotives, including 45596 and 45690 Jubilees, are retrofitted with modern safety equipment.

Alongside the preserved Jubilee Class, proudly wearing BR Maroon and BR Black liveries, is a suite of equally preserved Mk1 coaches in both Maroon and Blood & Custard liveries, offering a long-lost view out the window to serve both nostalgic and enthusiastic tastes.

The West Cornwall Steam Railtour Add-On brings a series of scenarios and services to the challenging Penzance - St Austell route. Experience the Jubilee Class away from the 1950s, as it is in more recent years, thanks to preservation. Re-kindle holiday memories with the Christmas train, dressed in festive fairy lights! With Scenario Planner, take the steam railtour action to whichever route you like.

**Please Note: For the full experience, we recommend you own Train Sim World®: West Cornwall Local: Penzance - St Austell & St Ives which is available as a separate purchase.**

# Key Features:
LMS Jubilee Class locomotive in preserved condition including:

- BR Maroon livery
- BR Black livery
- Modernised cab equipment
- Selectable “Cornish Riviera Express” headboard
- Includes Mk1 BG, BSO, FK and TSO coaches in Maroon and Blood & Custard liveries
- Festive Train decorated with Fairy Lights
- Highly detailed, feature-rich, driving cab
- True-to-life performance and handling
- Includes Training Module on the Training Center
- Includes 5 Scenarios and 4 additional Timetable Services for West Cornwall Local
- Livery Designer, Scenario Planner and Creators Club compatible
- Powered by Dovetail Games’ proprietary SimuGraph® vehicle dynamics engine and Unreal Engine 4® technology
